projects.title: My First Personal Website
projects.description: I wanted an online version of my resume so I made this page under the domain name noahheraud.com. This site contains all the essential information and a way to connect. I did it outside of school. It is of course destined to evolve

projects.title: Website that create personnalised touristic itineraries
projects.description: This website is a project that I did with two friends. It is a website that allows you to create a personalized itinerary for your trip. It is still in development. We are currently working on the back-end.
